problem_definition.command_line: ./generate_mesh 5 1000; fluidity diffusion-dg-stretched.flml; cp diffusion-dg-stretched.stat stretched-5.stat; cp diffusion-dg-stretched_1.vtu stretched-5.vtu; ./generate_mesh 10 1000; fluidity diffusion-dg-stretched.flml; cp diffusion-dg-stretched.stat stretched-10.stat; cp diffusion-dg-stretched_1.vtu stretched-10.vtu; ./generate_mesh 20 1000; fluidity diffusion-dg-stretched.flml; cp diffusion-dg-stretched.stat stretched-20.stat; cp diffusion-dg-stretched_1.vtu stretched-20.vtu; ./generate_mesh 30 1000; fluidity diffusion-dg-stretched.flml; cp diffusion-dg-stretched.stat stretched-30.stat; cp diffusion-dg-stretched_1.vtu stretched-30.vtu

variables.variable: import os files = os.listdir("./") solvers_converged = not "matrixdump" in files and not "matrixdump.info" in files

import numpy from fluidity_tools import stat_parser layers = numpy.array([5,10,20,30]) dxs=1.0/layers errorBR=[] for layer in layers: s=stat_parser("stretched-"+repr(layer)+".stat") errorBR.append((s["MyState"]['BR_error']['l2norm'][-1]))
errorBR=numpy.array(errorBR) convergenceBR=numpy.log(errorBR[:-1]/errorBR[1:])/numpy.log((1.0*layers[1:])/(1.0*layers[:-1])) print(errorBR)
